name: MenuItemButton
desc: A button for use in a [MenuBar], in a menu created with [MenuAnchor], or on its own, that can be activated by click or keyboard navigation.

fields.name: onPressed
fields.desc: Called when the button is tapped or otherwise activated.

fields.name: onHover
fields.desc: Called when a pointer enters or exits the button response area.

fields.name: requestFocusOnHover
fields.desc: Determine if hovering can request focus.

fields.name: onFocusChange
fields.desc: Handler called when the focus changes.

fields.name: shortcut
fields.desc: The optional shortcut that selects this [MenuItemButton].

fields.name: semanticsLabel
fields.desc: An optional Semantics label, applied to the entire [MenuItemButton].

fields.name: leadingIcon
fields.desc: An optional icon to display before the [child] label.

fields.name: trailingIcon
fields.desc: An optional icon to display after the [child] label.

fields.name: closeOnActivate
fields.desc: {@template flutter.material.menu_anchor.closeOnActivate} Determines if the menu will be closed when a [MenuItemButton] is pressed.

fields.name: overflowAxis
fields.desc: The direction in which the menu item expands.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget displayed in the center of this button.
